attributes.title: File:Whent heraldry.png
attributes.actor: Ryan McKenna'''Willis Wode''' is a recurring character in the Season 1

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ser Willis Wode is a hedge knight sworn to the service of Lady Shella Whent. He is a stiff necked and stolid man. He survives the journey to the Eyrie in the books.
